name: Wooden Buckets

pages.text: $(thing)Wooden Buckets$() are an early game fluid container. They can contain 1000 mB of fluid. They can pick up any kind of fluid that is used for recipes, such as those in a $(l:mechanics/pot)Pot$() or $(l:mechanics/barrels)Barrel$(). However, wooden buckets cannot place source blocks. Dumping its fluid on the ground results in a small amount of fluid that quickly disappears.
The wooden bucket is made of $(thing)Lumber$().
